title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Relevant Counties) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 295 of 2020) are revoked.
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Relevant Counties) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 295 of 2020) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 August, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th September, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [327] 3

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) 
(Relevant Counties) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 295 of 2020) (as amended) 
provided for certain temporary restrictions in County Kildare because of 
Covid-19. S.I. No. 295 of 2020 is revoked by these Regulations. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [327]
